p: In Brazil, many studies have already been carried out to investigate the etiology of acute respiratory diseases [ 12]. During the period of 2003â€“2009, nasopharyngeal aspirates were examined in more than 2000 children less than 5 years old, and HRSV were found in at least 42% of positivity between respiratory viruses identified in children hospitalized with acute respiratory disease [ 85, 105].
